code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderForm(){const[product,setProduct]=useState('');const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert(`Order placed for ${quantity} units of ${product}!`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE6 Place an Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Product Name",value:product,onChange:e=>setProduct(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Quantity",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{marginTop:'10px'},type:"submit",children:"Order Now"})]})]});}export default OrderForm;
